text: Mulberry Taiseng lives up to what it promises. In terms of learning, we have witnessed our child grow since he first started a few months back- from not being unable  to utter a proper word to forming a sentence now at PN level! In terms of learning through fun, our little one looks forward to school everyday with smiles! Thankful for the dedicated team of teachers who are so nurturing and caring all the time!

Safe and conducive environment with loving teachers . My child looks forward to going to school every day! More importantly, despite being in the PN class for only a few months, he is able to speak many new words- definitely a pleasant surprise! Thank you teachers! ðŸ«¶

Been here since february! The teachers are warm and kind! Very patient towards my n1 and k2. Both of them look forward to school everyday. The daily activities is very balance with serious learning and also play based learning.

Highly recommend!!
